en.title: Control systems + TP
en.library_recommends: • "Commande numerique de systemes dynamiques : cours d'automatique / Roland Longchamp". Year:2010. ISBN:978-2-88074-880-7

free_text.Prérequis: [li]Real analysis[br/][li]Complex analysis[br/][li]Signals and systems[br/][li]Represent a physical process as a system with its inputs, outputs and disturbances, A1[br/][li]Derive the dynamic equations for the system, A2[br/][li]Represent a linear system by a transfer function, A5
free_text.Bibliographie et matériel: R. Longchamp, [i]Commande numérique de systèmes dynamiques - Cours d'automatique[/i] :  Volume 1, [i]Méthodes de base[/i], Presses Polytechniques et Universitaires Romandes troisième édition, 2010.
free_text.Mots clés: Digital control, analysis and design of control systems, stability, PID controller
free_text.Forme d'enseignement: Ex cathedra course, integrated demos and case studies, hands-on laboratory sessions.
free_text.Contenu: Introduction to automatic control. Sampling and signal reconstruction. Discrete-time systems. z-transform. Closed-loop transfer function. Frequency response. Stability. Discrete equivalents. Direct design. Continuous-time control.
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: [b]Domain skills:[/b][br/][li]Analyze a linear dynamical system (both time and frequency responses), A4[br/][li]Construct and analyse a discrete-time model for a dynamic system, A7[br/][li]Design a PID controller, A9[br/][li]Design a simple controller for a dynamic system, A10[br/][li]Assess the stability, performance and robustness of a closed-loop system, A14[br/][li]Define (specifications) the adequate control performance for dynamic systems, A15[br/][li]Propose several control solutions, formulate the trade-offs, choose the options, A16[br/][br/][b]Transversal skills:[/b][br/][li]Time management, T1[br/][li]Self-assessment of acquired skills, T2[br/][li]Analyse decisions in terms of subjective and objective aspects, T9[br/][li]Be perseverant through difficulties, T15[br/][li]Analyse the consequences of a decision or solution, T20
